channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for AZ
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for AZ

item.title: Report E-2024030592
item.description:
Report E-2024030592

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-01T03:13:04+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-23
  • City: HOLBROOK
  • State: AZ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 5000
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Approximately 5 gallons of UN1263 was released from one 5-gallon DM due to improper blocking and bracing. The release impacted the trailer floor. No Drains, Soils, or waterways were reported impacted.

item.title: Report E-2024030606
item.description:
Report E-2024030606

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-01T03:13:04+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-20
  • City: PHOENIX
  • State: AZ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO Logistics
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: It was reported that a 55-gallon metal drum of UN1993 Service Pro Non-Chlorinated Brake Cleaner was punctured by fallen freight causing approximately 5 oz to release on the trailer floor. ERTS reviewed the SDS with the caller and determined terminal personnel could clean the release with the PPE available on-site.

item.title: Report E-2024030487
item.description:
Report E-2024030487

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-27T15:12:38+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-23
  • City: PHOENIX
  • State: AZ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: XPO reported a spill that occurred inside of a trailer but was moved to the dock in Phoenix, AZ. The spill consists of 2-5 gallon bladder bags inside of a box, product Emulsinator, which arrived from the previous terminal leaking from the inside of the box. The terminal estimated 2 gallons total were released, but no surfaces were impacted, only the box.

  • Description: It was reported that 2-oz release of UN2680 "Lithium hydroxide" that was released from (1) a 20-pound plastic bag affecting the trailer floor. The bag was punctured by a forklift at the loading terminal.

item.title: Report X-2024030970
item.description:
Report X-2024030970

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-26T15:10:57+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-15
  • City: GOODYEAR
  • State: AZ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Hazmat was carefully unloaded out of a trailer, placed on correct trailer load belt were the package was slightly crushed by NC's, when pulled off belt to trailer the Hazmat was leaking. DescribePack: The cap of the Jerrican Bottle was torn allowing the product to leak out of the bottle DurationRel: 10 and MitigateEffect: Minimalization of excessive shaking of the bottle and keeping the bottle upright

item.title: Report X-2024030835
item.description:
Report X-2024030835

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-26T15:10:57+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-13
  • City: PHOENIX
  • State: AZ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: SequenceEvent: package found open and wet upon inspection the lids on the bottles had come loose causing an internal leak there was very little packing to protect product DescribePack: lids on top came loose DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: i placed package in hazmat cage then placed in yellow drum for processing

item.title: Report X-2024030870
item.description:
Report X-2024030870

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-26T15:10:57+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-08
  • City: YUMA
  • State: AZ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package came out of trailer leaking white powder. Package was immediately placed inside a hazmat tote in the upright position to prevent future damages. DescribePack: Package was cracked from the bottom, which is what caused the damage. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed inside a red hazmat tote in the upright position.
